verses.verse: וַ֭יַּעַן <WH6030> Then answered בִּלְדַּ֥ד <WH1085> Bildad הַשֻּׁחִ֗י <WH7747> the Shuhite וַיֹּאמַֽר׃ <WH559> and said

עַד־ <WH5704> How long אָ֤נָה ׀ <WH575> How תְּשִׂימ֣וּן <WH7760> [will it be ere] ye make קִנְצֵ֣י <WH7078> an end לְמִלִּ֑ין <WH4405> answer תָּ֝בִ֗ינוּ <WH995> understanding וְאַחַ֥ר <WH310> and afterwards נְדַבֵּֽר׃ <WH1696> we will speak
מַ֭דּוּעַ <WH4069> Why נֶחְשַׁ֣בְנוּ <WH2803> Wherefore are we counted כַבְּהֵמָ֑ה <WH929> as beasts נִ֝טְמִ֗ינוּ <WH2933> [and] reputed vile בְּעֵינֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH5869> affliction

טֹֽרֵ֥ף <WH2963> He teareth נַפְשׁ֗וֹ <WH5315> himself בְּאַ֫פּ֥וֹ <WH639> in his anger הַ֭לְמַעַנְךָ <WH4616> because of תֵּעָ֣זַב <WH5800> be forsaken אָ֑רֶץ <WH776> shall the earth וְיֶעְתַּק־ <WH6275> be removed צ֝֗וּר <WH6697> for thee? and shall the rock מִמְּקֹמֽוֹ׃ <WH4725> country

גַּ֤ם <WH1571> Indeed א֣וֹר <WH216> Yea the light רְשָׁעִ֣ים <WH7563> of the wicked יִדְעָ֑ךְ <WH1846> shall be put out וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> no יִ֝גַּ֗הּ <WH5050> shall not shine שְׁבִ֣יב <WH7632> and the spark אִשּֽׁוֹ׃ <WH784> of his fire
א֭וֹר <WH216> The light חָשַׁ֣ךְ <WH2821> shall be dark בְּאָהֳל֑וֹ <WH168> in his tabernacle וְ֝נֵר֗וֹ <WH5216> and his candle עָלָ֥יו <WH5921> above יִדְעָֽךְ׃ <WH1846> shall be put out
יֵֽ֭צְרוּ <WH3334> shall be straitened צַעֲדֵ֣י <WH6806> The steps אוֹנ֑וֹ <WH202> of his strength וְֽתַשְׁלִיכֵ֥הוּ <WH7993> shall cast him down עֲצָתֽוֹ׃ <WH6098> and his own counsel

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for שֻׁלַּ֣ח <WH7971> For he is cast בְּרֶ֣שֶׁת <WH7568> into a net בְּרַגְלָ֑יו <WH7272> by his own feet וְעַל־ <WH5921> on שְׂ֝בָכָ֗ה <WH7639> upon a snare יִתְהַלָּֽךְ׃ <WH1980> and he walketh
יֹאחֵ֣ז <WH270> shall take בְּעָקֵ֣ב <WH6119> [him] by the heel פָּ֑ח <WH6341> The gin יַחֲזֵ֖ק <WH2388> shall prevail עָלָ֣יו <WH5921> and צַמִּֽים׃ <WH6782> [and] the robber
טָמ֣וּן <WH2934> [is] laid בָּאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> for him in the ground חַבְל֑וֹ <WH2256> The snare וּ֝מַלְכֻּדְתּ֗וֹ <WH4434> and a trap עֲלֵ֣י <WH5921> on נָתִֽיב׃ <WH5410> for him in the way
סָ֭בִיב <WH5439> on every side בִּֽעֲתֻ֣הוּ <WH1204> shall make him afraid בַלָּה֑וֹת <WH1091> Terrors וֶהֱפִיצֻ֥הוּ <WH6327> and shall drive לְרַגְלָֽיו׃ <WH7272> him to his feet
יְהִי־ <WH1961> become רָעֵ֥ב <WH7457> shall be hungerbitten אֹנ֑וֹ <WH202> His strength וְ֝אֵ֗יד <WH343> and destruction נָכ֥וֹן <WH3559> [shall be] ready לְצַלְעֽוֹ׃ <WH6763> at his side

יֹ֭אכַל <WH398> It shall devour בַּדֵּ֣י <WH905> the strength עוֹר֑וֹ <WH5785> of his skin יֹאכַ֥ל <WH398> shall devour בַּ֝דָּ֗יו <WH905> his strength בְּכ֣וֹר <WH1060> [even] the firstborn מָֽוֶת׃ <WH4194> of death

יִנָּתֵ֣ק <WH5423> shall be rooted out מֵ֭אָהֳלוֹ <WH168> of his tabernacle מִבְטַח֑וֹ <WH4009> His confidence וְ֝תַצְעִדֵ֗הוּ <WH6805> and it shall bring לְמֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> him to the king בַּלָּהֽוֹת׃ <WH1091> of terrors

תִּשְׁכּ֣וֹן <WH7931> It shall dwell בְּ֭אָהֳלוֹ <WH168> in his tabernacle מִבְּלִי־ <WH1097> because [it is] none ל֑וֹ יְזֹרֶ֖ה <WH2219> shall be scattered עַל־ <WH5921> on נָוֵ֣הוּ <WH5116> upon his habitation גָפְרִֽית׃ <WH1614> of his brimstone

מִ֭תַּחַת <WH8478> Thahash שָֽׁרָשָׁ֣יו <WH8328> His roots יִבָ֑שׁוּ <WH3001> shall be dried up וּ֝מִמַּ֗עַל <WH4605> beneath and above יִמַּ֥ל <WH5243> be cut off קְצִירֽוֹ׃ <WH7105> shall his branch

זִֽכְרוֹ־ <WH2143> His remembrance אָ֭בַד <WH6> shall perish מִנִּי־ <WH4480> from אָ֑רֶץ <WH776> from the earth וְלֹא־ <WH3808> has no שֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> and he shall have no name ל֝֗וֹ עַל־ <WH5921> and פְּנֵי־ <WH6440> accept חֽוּץ׃ <WH2351> abroad
יֶ֭הְדְּפֻהוּ <WH1920> He shall be driven מֵא֣וֹר <WH216> from light אֶל־ <WH413> into חֹ֑שֶׁךְ <WH2822> into darkness וּֽמִתֵּבֵ֥ל <WH8398> out of the world יְנִדֻּֽהוּ׃ <WH5074> and chased

לֹ֘א <WH3808> has no נִ֤ין <WH5209> He shall neither have son ל֣וֹ וְלֹא־ <WH3808> has no נֶ֣כֶד <WH5220> nor nephew בְּעַמּ֑וֹ <WH5971> among his people וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> Nor שָׂ֝רִ֗יד <WH8300> nor any remaining בִּמְגוּרָֽיו׃ <WH4033> in his dwellings

עַל־ <WH5921> at י֭וֹמוֹ <WH3117> at his day נָשַׁ֣מּוּ <WH8074> [him] shall be astonied אַחֲרֹנִ֑ים <WH314> They that come after וְ֝קַדְמֹנִ֗ים <WH6931> as they that went before אָ֣חֲזוּ <WH270> are seized שָֽׂעַר׃ <WH8178> horror

אַךְ־ <WH389> Surely אֵ֭לֶּה <WH428> such מִשְׁכְּנ֣וֹת <WH4908> Surely such [are] the dwellings עַוָּ֑ל <WH5767> of the wicked וְ֝זֶ֗ה <WH2088> and this מְק֣וֹם <WH4725> and this [is] the place לֹא־ <WH3808> does not יָדַֽע־ <WH3045> [of him that] knoweth אֵֽל׃ <WH410> not God ס
